case_title: Malik UMAR ASLAM AWAN vs Mst SUMAIRA MALIK and others

issues.issue_1: Whether in the facts and circumstances given in the election petition, the election of NA-69 is void?
issues.issue_2: Whether the election petition is not maintainable and has been instituted in violation of the provisions of the Representation of the People Act, 1976?

allegations.corrupt_acts: Alleged corrupt and illegal acts by respondent No. 1 before and during polling.
allegations.bogus_votes: Claims of bogus votes cast and manipulation of election results.
allegations.degree_fraud: Accusation that respondent No. 1 procured a fabricated Bachelor of Arts degree through impersonation.

findings.degree_verification: University of Punjab verified the degree as valid after two inquiries.
findings.impersonation_claims: No credible evidence provided to substantiate impersonation allegations.
findings.photograph_comparison: Photographs on admission forms matched respondent No. 1.

decision.issue_1: Decided against the petitioner; allegations of fraud and impersonation not proven.
decision.issue_2: Election petition deemed maintainable but dismissed due to lack of merit.
